status_prc_phase.qsel: SELECT [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase1].confirm_idc_str, tblStatus.status_lv, tblStatus.status_patient_obj, tblStatus.status_vessels FROM tblStatus RIGHT JOIN [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase1] ON tblStatus.id_patient = [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase1].confirm_idc_str UNION SELECT [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase2].confirm_idc_str, tblStatus.status_lv, tblStatus.status_patient_obj, tblStatus.status_vessels FROM [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase2] LEFT JOIN tblStatus ON [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase2].confirm_idc_str = tblStatus.id_patient UNION SELECT [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase3].confirm_idc_str, tblStatus.status_lv, tblStatus.status_patient_obj, tblStatus.status_vessels FROM [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase3] LEFT JOIN tblStatus ON [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase3].confirm_idc_str = tblStatus.id_patient;

status_prc_phase1.qsel: SELECT [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase1].confirm_idc_str, tblStatus.status_lv, tblStatus.status_patient_obj, tblStatus.status_vessels FROM [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase1] LEFT JOIN tblStatus ON [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase1].confirm_idc_str = tblStatus.id_patient;

status_prc_phase2.qsel: SELECT [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase2].confirm_idc_str, tblStatus.status_lv, tblStatus.status_patient_obj, tblStatus.status_vessels FROM [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase2] LEFT JOIN tblStatus ON [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase2].confirm_idc_str = tblStatus.id_patient;

status_prc_phase3.qsel: SELECT [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase3].confirm_idc_str, tblStatus.status_lv, tblStatus.status_patient_obj, tblStatus.status_vessels FROM [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase3] LEFT JOIN tblStatus ON [qselFilterValidLesion-Phase3].confirm_idc_str = tblStatus.id_patient;
